name: Super Dimensional Robo, Dailiner
effect:
[CONT](VC):All of your grade 3 units get [Shield] +10000.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one normal unit from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you revealed a grade 3, this unit gets [Power] +20000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Ice Prison Necromancer, Cocytus
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if your drop zone has ten or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000. If it has twenty or more cards, it gets [Power] +20000/[Critical] +1 instead of +10000.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put four cards from the top of your deck into your drop zone], and call up to the number of grade 3 cards in your soul +2 of cards from your drop zone to (RC). (If there is one grade 3, call up to three cards)

name: Blue Storm Supreme Dragon, Glory Maelstrom
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], until end of turn, your opponent cannot intercept, and can only call up to one card from his or her hand to (GC) for each battle. If your soul has a card with "Maelstrom" in its card name, all your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Platinum Ace
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When it attacks, if your grade 3 or greater vanguard's [Power] is 30000 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Magical Police Quilt
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your vanguards gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC):When your vanguard attacks, if that unit's [Power] is 30000 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card. ([Power] gain from boost is included)

name: Greed Shade
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if your drop zone has ten or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], put two cards from the top of your deck into your drop zone, and return a card not named "Greed Shade" from your drop zone to your hand.

name: Ripple Banshee
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed from drop zone, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +4000 until end of turn.

name: Coral Assault
effect:
[CONT](RC):During the battle it attacked, if four or more of your other units are in [Rest], this unit gets [Power] +15000.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if the total number of attacks this turn is four or more, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and draw a card.

name: Wheel Assault
effect:
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it boosted, choose two of your rear-guards, and you may exchange their positions.
[AUTO]:When rode upon, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and call a card from your hand to (RC).

name: Super Dimensional Robo, Daizaurus
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each card in your damage zone.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it attacked, if your vanguard's [Power] is 35000 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], and one of your vanguards gets [Power] +10000/drive +1 until end of turn.

name: Roaring Beast, Audion
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1] grade 3], put any number of your rear-guards into your soul, and this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn for each of those cards.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 3], and until end of that battle, when your opponent would call from his or her hand to (GC), he or she must call two more at the same time.

name: Glory Maker
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it boosts, if the boosted unit's [Power] is 30000 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and your opponent can only call grade 0 cards from his or her hand until end of that battle. ([Power] gain from boost is included)

name: Master Swordsman, Nightstorm
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][put two cards from the top of your deck into your drop zone], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks a vanguard, if your drop zone has ten or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.

name: Stormride Ghost Ship
effect:
[CONT](Hand):This card cannot be normal called. (Cannot be called to (GC) either)
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, draw a card, and retire this unit.

name: Troubadour Cadaver, Alfio
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, if you have ten or more cards in your drop zone, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and [Counter-Charge 1]/[Soul-Charge 1].

name: Hydro Hurricane Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, if it is the first battle of the turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Blue Wings of Great Cause, Phayllos
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:When your drive check reveals a [Heal] trigger, you may [Stand] this unit.
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When it attacks a vanguard, if you have another unit with "Blue Wings" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you have four or more other units with "Blue Wings" in their card names, [Stand] this unit instead of [Power] +5000.

name: Storm Rider, Nikoloz
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one "Marine General of the Restless Tides, Algos" from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.

name: Battle Unit Commandant, Glegio
effect:

effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your vanguard attacks, if that unit's [Power] is 30000 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit. ([Power] gain from boost is included)
